data.Name: Kairos Aerospace
data.Tagline: Our transformative technology identifies the largest methane leaks for oil & gas companies.
data.About: Our transformative technology gives the oil and gas industry the power to retain more product and achieve its environmental goals by identifying the largest methane leaks with our actionable and efficient method. We combine patented hardware with proprietary software to produce actionable data about our customersâ€™ operations. Combining low-cost, high-quality sensors and high-powered, high-scale computing allows us to cover basin-wide areas while identifying the most significant leaks. Kairos technology is already in widespread use across North America. Contact us to start reducing emissions now.
